content: add some seasonal squash to your amigurumi thanksgiving cornucopia or to your child s food-shopping playtime shown in pastel yellow & avocado additional materials split ring stitch markers fiberfill stuffing worked in continuous rounds items in the thanksgiving cornucopia set cornucopia 1 apple 2 pumpkin 3 corn on the cob 4 squash eggplant 5 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/cornucopia 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/apple-80839ad 3 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/pumpkin-80840ad 4 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/corn-on-the-cob-80841ad 5 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/eggplant-80843ad
